item.title: Dee add a quote by Jamie McGuire
item.description: "I know we're fucked up, alright? I'm impulsive, and hot tempered, and you get under my skin like no one else. You act like you hate me one minute, and then need me the next. I never get anything right, and I don't deserve you...but I fucking love you, Abby. I love you more than I loved anyone or anything ever. When you're around, I don't need booze, or money, or the fighting, or the one-night stands..." -- Jamie McGuire

item.title: Dee add a quote by William Strunk Jr.
item.description: "Omit needless words." -- William Strunk Jr.

item.title: Dee add a quote by Kirsty Moseley
item.description: "She was the only thing I needed. If everything else went away tomorrow, the big house, all the cars, the money, I wouldn't care. As long as I still got to hold her every night, I would still be the luckiest guy in the world." -- Kirsty Moseley

item.title: Dee add a quote by Kirsty Moseley
item.description:
"But I don't want to ruin your future.
You are my future, Angel." -- Kirsty Moseley

item.title: Dee add a quote by Kirsty Moseley
item.description: "Liam, if you hurt my sister, best friend or not, I will kill you." -- Kirsty Moseley

item.title: Dee add a quote by Kiera Cass
item.description: "I hope you find someone you can't live without.I really do. And I hope you never have to know what it's like to have to try and live without them." -- Kiera Cass

item.title: Dee add a quote by Kelly Elliott
item.description: "i was going to kick my ass if i hurt her in a dream" -- Kelly Elliott

item.title: Dee add a quote by Kelly Elliott
item.description: "Ellie I have never in life... ever sweetheart...experienced these feelings that i have for you. You walk into a room and i have to catch my breath at the sight of you. You flash your beautiful smile at me and there's not a damn thing in this world I wouldnt do for you. Your laugh moves through my body like a jolt of electricity. Your eyes captivate mine; your lips bring me to my knee's. I want to know every part of you Ellie. I'm just as confused by these feelings as you are sweetheart but i want you to know something, I'll never push you or give up on us I promise you that. Please Ellie just let me in. Let me prove to you how much i want to be with you" -- Kelly Elliott

item.title: Dee add a quote by Colleen Hoover
item.description: "Don't take life too seriously. Punch it in the face when it needs a good hit. Laugh at it." -- Colleen Hoover

item.title: Dee add a quote by Colleen Hoover
item.description: "F#%k all the firsts, Sky. The only thing that matters to me with you are the forevers." -- Colleen Hoover

item.title: Dee add a quote by Colleen Hoover
item.description: "So you keep your ocean, I'll take the Lake." -- Colleen Hoover

item.title: Dee add a quote by Colleen Hoover
item.description: "Imperfections define perfection" -- Colleen Hoover

item.title: Dee add a quote by Gennifer Albin
item.description: "Take the happiness you can, even if it's only a little." -- Gennifer Albin

item.title: Dee add a quote by Stephanie Perkins
item.description: "For the two of us, home isn't a place. It is a person. And we are finally home." -- Stephanie Perkins

item.title: Dee add a quote by Veronica Roth
item.description: "I might be in love with you." He smiles a little. "I'm waiting until I'm sure to tell you, though." -- Veronica Roth

item.title: Dee add a quote by Jamie McGuire
item.description: "I belong to my beloved, and my beloved is mine." -- Jamie McGuire

item.title: Dee add a quote by Jamie McGuire
item.description: "I'm not your anything," I snapped, glaring up at him. His eyebrows pulled in and he stopped dancing. "You're my everything." -- Jamie McGuire

item.title: Dee add a quote by Jamie McGuire
item.description: "I know you deserve better than me. You think I don’t know that? But if there was any woman made for me…it’s you. I’ll do whatever I have to do, Pidge. Do you hear me? I’ll do anything." -- Jamie McGuire

item.title: Dee add a quote by Cassandra Clare
item.description: "And now I’m looking at you,” he said, “and you’re asking me if I still want you, as if I could stop loving you. As if I would want to give up the thing that makes me stronger than anything else ever has. I never dared give much of myself to anyone before – bits of myself to the Lightwoods, to Isabelle and Alec, but it took years to do it – but, Clary, since the first time I saw you, I have belonged to you completely. I still do. If you want me." -- Cassandra Clare

item.title: Dee add a quote by Cassandra Clare
Dee add a quote by Cassandra Clare
item.description: "There is no pretending," Jace said with absolute clarity. "I love you, and I will love you until I die, and if there is life after that, I'll love you then." -- Cassandra Clare

item.title: Dee add a quote by Edgar Rice Burroughs
item.description: "Am I alive and a reality, or am I but a dream?" -- Edgar Rice Burroughs

item.title: Dee add a quote by John Locke
item.description: "Reading furnishes the mind only with materials of knowledge; it is thinking that makes what we read ours." -- John Locke

item.title: Dee add a quote by Sarah Dessen
item.description: "Life is an awful, ugly place to not have a best friend." -- Sarah Dessen

item.title: Dee add a quote by J. Lynn
item.description: "As long as the sun’s shining, shit can’t be that bad." -- J. Lynn

item.title: Dee add a quote by J. Lynn
item.description: "We are your friends. It is the law of friendship that you tell us things you don’t want to tell us." -- J. Lynn

item.title: Dee add a quote by Jude Deveraux
item.description: "Love can make even nice people do awful things." -- Jude Deveraux

item.title: Dee add a quote by Marie Lu
item.description: "Each day means a new twenty-four hours. Each day means everything's possible again. You live in the moment, you die in the moment, you take it all one day at a time. -Day" -- Marie Lu

item.title: Dee add a quote by Will Rogers
item.description: "Even if you are on the right track, you’ll get run over if you just sit there." -- Will Rogers

item.title: Dee add a quote by Amy Tintera
item.description: "I think people immediately assumed I was yours so they stayed far away.' He met my eyes and smiled. 'I was. I am.' He leaned forward and brushed his lips to mine. 'Yours." -- Amy Tintera
